references.paper_title: Learning transferable architectures for scalable image recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces a seminal approach to neural architecture search (NAS) that has significantly influenced the field and is frequently cited in subsequent works.

references.paper_title: Once for all: Train one network and specialize it for efficient deployment
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly efficient method for training a single neural network that can be specialized for various tasks and hardware, leading to increased efficiency in NAS.

references.paper_title: Regularized evolution for image classifier architecture search
references.reason: This paper introduces the Regularized Evolution algorithm which is a highly efficient and effective algorithm for NAS, significantly improving the scalability of the search process.

references.paper_title: NAS-bench-101: Towards reproducible neural architecture search
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset for NAS which enables reproducible research and facilitates the comparison of different NAS methods.

references.paper_title: Multi-objective optimization by learning space partition
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel multi-objective optimization algorithm that is specifically designed for NAS, improving the quality and efficiency of the search process.
